TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParentControlDesigner extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展支持嵌套控件的 的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a that supports nested controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为可包含子控件的控件设计器提供基类。 provides a base class for designers of controls that can contain child controls. 除了从和类继承的方法和功能之外 ，还 允许将子控件添加到中，在其中选定，并在设计时其行为在控件中排列。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the and classes, enables child controls to be added to, removed from, selected within, and arranged within the control whose behavior it extends at design time. 可以使用将设计器与类型相关联 。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅 [扩展设计时支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现自定义 。The following example demonstrates how to implement a custom . 此代码示例是为接口提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void CreateTool(class System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem tool) cil managed

param.name: tool
param.span: 要从中创建组件的 。

span.span: The to create a component from.

summary.span: 从指定工具创建一个组件或控件并将其添加到当前的设计文档。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的组件或控件位于当前所选控件的中央。The new component or control is positioned at the center of the currently selected control. 如果该工具具有指定的默认大小，则此方法将使用该工具的默认大小。This method uses the default size for the tool, if the tool has a default size specified. 若要指定组件或控件的位置和大小，请使用其他重载 方法之一。To specify a location or location and size for the component or control, use one of the other overloaded methods.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

param.name: tool

span.span: The to create a component from.

param.name: location
param.span: 设计时视图屏幕坐标中的 ，此位置将作为组件的中心。

span.span: The , in design-time view screen coordinates, at which to center the component.

summary.span: 从指定工具创建组件或控件，并将其添至当前设计文档中的指定位置。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document at the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的组件或控件位于参数指定的位置附近 `location` 。The new component or control is positioned around the location specified by the `location` parameter. 如果组件具有默认大小，则此方法将使用该工具组件的默认大小。This method uses the default size for the tool's component, if the component has a default size. 若要指定组件或控件的位置和大小，请使用适当的重载 方法。To specify a location and size for the component or control, use the appropriate overloaded method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的组件或控件的位置与参数的和值指定的位置上的左上角位置相同 `bounds` 。The new component or control is positioned with its upper left corner at the location specified by the and values of the `bounds` parameter. 新组件或控件的大小将设置为由参数的和属性指定的值 `bounds` 。The size of the new component or control will be set to the values specified by the and properties of the `bounds` parameter.

value.span: ，指示已添至设计器的控件的默认位置。

span.span: A that indicates the default location for a control added to the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认位置通常 (0，0) 。The default location is usually (0,0). 如果容器有特殊的边框或出于其他原因，通常会更改默认位置。The default location is typically changed if the container has special borders, or for other reasons.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 在将拖放对象放置到控件设计器视图上时调用。

span.span: Called when a drag-and-drop object is dropped onto the control designer view.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将检查可处理操作的拖放处理程序的任何父控件。This method checks any parent control for a drag-and-drop handler that can handle the operation instead. 如果存在，则此方法将传递 给方法，并返回。If one exists, this method passes the to the method and returns. 如果不存在父拖放处理程序，则此方法将尝试在设计器控件上删除工具箱项时创建工具。If no parent drag-and-drop handler exists, this method attempts to create a tool if a toolbox item has been dropped on the designer control.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnMouseDragBegin (int x, int y);

protected: override void OnMouseDragBegin(int x, int y);

param.name: x
param.span: 屏幕坐标中鼠标的 x 坐标。

span.span: The x-coordinate of the mouse in screen coordinates.

param.name: y
param.span: 屏幕坐标中鼠标的 y 坐标。

span.span: The y-coordinate of the mouse in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 调用以响应在组件上时按下鼠标左键并按住不放这一操作。

span.span: Called in response to the left mouse button being pressed and held while over the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法是为了响应在组件上按下鼠标左键。This method is called in response to the left mouse button being pressed on a component. 设计器将重写此方法的基窗体，为控件内的组件提供 "套索" 选择机制。The designer overrides the base form of this method to provide a "lasso" selection mechanism for components within the control. > [!NOTE] > 可以将屏幕坐标中的点传递给 类的方法， 以获取相对于控件左上角的点的坐标。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

span.span: to cancel the drag operation; to commit it.

summary.span: 在拖放操作结束时调用，以完成或取消此次操作。

span.span: Called at the end of a drag-and-drop operation to complete or cancel the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖动操作结束时调用此方法。This method is called at the end of a drag operation. 此方法或者提交到或取消拖动操作。This method either commits to or cancels the drag operation.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSetCursor() cil managed

summary.span: 提供更改当前鼠标光标的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to change the current mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法根据以下规则设置鼠标光标：如果工具箱服务选择了一个工具，则允许工具箱服务设置光标。This method sets the mouse cursor according to the following rules: If the toolbox service has a tool selected, it allows the toolbox service to set the cursor. 否则，鼠标光标将设置为默认的鼠标光标。Otherwise, the mouse cursor is set to the default mouse cursor.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 接口方法重写将一组属性添加到此设计器的控件，使用户能够设置与网格显示和子控件对齐相关的选项。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's control that allow a user to set options related to the grid display and child control alignment. 此方法可添加以下可浏览的属性： `DrawGrid` 、 `SnapToGrid` 和 `GridSize` 。This method adds the following browsable properties: `DrawGrid`, `SnapToGrid`, and `GridSize`.

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support
